Simon Urbanek's Benchmark 2.5

Source: R/bm25.R
bm25f.Rd

Use the total time for all 15 tests to decide whether you would benefit from running time-consuming tasks on a faster server.

Usage

bm25f(note = "none specified")

Details

Exports information to a file

See also

bm25() for a benchmark without saving results in a file
